 1996-19291996-12-190,  ,  ,  HEALTH, 
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1025) which permit the use of the sequestering agent "calcium disodium EDTA" in soft drinks and ready-to-drink teas and clarify that the permitted levels of use for this food additive are calculated as the anhydrous form.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1997-0030 Publication Date: 1997-01-08
